mapper.select: { call proc_boardList(#{key, jdbcType=CURSOR, mode=OUT, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=ntVO}) }
mapper.insert: insert into board(b_no, b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_hit, b_date, b_file) values(seq_board_no.nextval, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_writer}, 0, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{b_file})
mapper.select:
select b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_hit, NVL(b_file, '없음') b_file from board
AND b_no=#{b_no}
AND b_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b_writer LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by b_no desc
